hibernate-mapping.query: from edu.ucsf.lava.crms.protocol.model.ProtocolConfig protocolConfig left join fetch protocolConfig.timepointsBase timepointConfig left join fetch timepointConfig.visitsBase visitConfig left join fetch visitConfig.instrumentsBase instrumentConfig where protocolConfig.id = :protocolConfigId
SELECT new edu.ucsf.lava.core.list.model.LabelValueBean(pc.label, pc.id) from ProtocolConfig pc order by pc.label
